text.text:
*Time to restart remo, 5 mins to go!*

Need to broadcast in all 3 buildings:
Cafe, PDSH, Main: 
The next Remo Reset is coming soon! Stay calm and remember to refresh your browser window after a few minutes.

<@U02350PTBH6> <@U0255S6N52N> <@U026YBNN9EC> whoever announces the reset, please comment here so the others know you're handling it.
